message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI 

The paper focuses on human-computer interaction (HCI) and deep learning-based self-driving car gesture recognition systems, which are relevant to several sub-categories. cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely category as the paper specifically mentions the need for further research into human-AV interaction. cs.CV (Computer Vision) is also likely as the paper discusses the development of a hand gesture recognition algorithm for self-driving cars. cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are relevant as the paper focuses on deep learning-based systems. Finally, cs.RO (Robotics) is relevant as the paper discusses the use of a simulator-based research platform for training and testing AVs.
